about_the_game:
(DEC 24, 2023) More than 16 Thai and Christmas food menus ready to Found!!(Update patch 1.3.1)
And what about your Christmas holiday? Do you have any ideas for food to try in Thailand? In 1.3.1 Gemini Flame Alpha Dragon updates Thai food and more than 16 delicious menus for your Christmas season, available for purchase in villages around the game. Bring it to refresh your adventurer with Thai food and familiar dishes. Let find out and have fun now!!

Campain Mode update:
- Fish and Chips (ฟิชแอนด์ชิปส์) You can buy it in Near's Village.
- Fired Onion (หอมทอด) You can buy it in Near's Village.
- Fired Vegtable (ผักทอด) You can buy it in Near's Village.
- Garlic Bread (ขนมปังกระเทียม) You can buy it in Near's Village.
- Hokkien Mee (หมี่ฮกเกี้ยน) It's a local food of Phuket. You can buy it in Zin's Village.
- Mee Hun with Soup (หมี่หุ้นพร้อมซุป) It's a local food of Phuket. You can buy it in Zin's Village.
- Moo Hong (หมูฮ้อง) It's a local food of Phuket. You can buy it in Zin's Village.
- Ngo Hiang (โลบะ) It's a local food of Phuket. You can buy it in Zin's Village.
- Chaom Omelette (ใข่เจียวชะอม) It's a Thai food. You can buy it in Tin's Village.
- Chu Chee Curry (แกงฉู่ฉี่) It's Thai food. You can buy it in Tin's Village.
- Kaprao Moo Sub (กระเพราหมูสับ) It's Thai food. You can buy it in Tin's Village.
- Thai Fried Rice (ข้าวผัดไทย) It's Thai food. You can buy it in Tin's Village.
- Fried Icecream (ไอติมทอด) You can buy it in Alio's Village.
- Honey Toast (ฮันนี่โทสต์ ) You can buy it in Alio's Village.
- Lunch Sandwich (แซนวิชมื้อเที่ยง) You can buy it in Alio's Village.
- Pan Fried Egg (ใข่กระทะ) You can buy it in Alio's Village.


(DEC 13, 2023) Have 2024 Plan? What's Next Stories? (Update patch 1.3.0)

It's now patch 1.3.0 and what's next for Geminiflame Alpha Dragon in 2024? You might ask after you finish playing. (But it's not over yet) You'll get an End credit story that tells you (or not?) that what happens next in the next major update. Come check it out in patch 1.3.0!! End credits that will spoil next year in 2024 are now available to play!!
Campain Mode update:
- End credit hint at what's happening in the next major update 2024?


(DEC 2, 2023) Documents 2 Stories upgrade!! (Update patch 1.2.4) We enter to the update 1.2.4 after we learned a lot about ''Geminiflame : Alpha Dragon'' stories from Updates 1.2.1, 1.2.2 and 1.2.3. which makes you want to know what it is a difference between "Informative stories" and "I need to know this stories". So I upgraded in update 1.2.4.
Campain and Last Stand Mode update:
- Upgraded Document ''Elf class'' in to the Side stories.
Last Stand Mode update
- Upgraded Document ''The night guard work'' in to the Side stories.

Hint: If you need to unlock 2 documents to see this update. I suggest you play Last Stand mode and you will find these 2 documents in one playthrough.

(Oct 25, 2023) New 3 Side Stories updated!! (Update patch 1.2.1)
New 3 Side Stories updated!! Thank you very much for purchasing my first game. After I released this game 1 week ago, there was a new Patch Update!! . This update will give more stories about the "Red Dragon" and Aurora her friends?, Named "Twilight" in campaign mode.
- Side Story 1: Aurora and Twilight: [Conditions] Rest anywhere before the dragon attacks the first village.
- Side Story 2: First Contact: [Conditions] Try to attack the dragon in the lower right corner. Before the dragon attacks the first village.
- Side Story 3 : Red Dragon : [Conditions] After Mainsolar and Red fight, just rest and you must do it before the dragon attacks the first village.


(Oct 17, 2023) New announcement and Patch Update in the GeminiFlame : Alpha Dragon ver 1.1.0. !!
Announcement 1. The game's release date has been moved to October 17, 2023 to allow for additional debugging as much as possible.
Announcement 2. Laststand Mode has been added!!


Laststand Mode is a new gameplay mode in addition to Campaign Mode. You and 4 adventurers and only 1 village. You must protect from the tireless army of the night and save the village and the 4 people. Will you be able to protect them from the nightmare night.!!


(Sep 29, 2023) What is the Concept of the Gemini Flame RPG world? (these 5 Main features are now available in the GeminiFlame : Alpha Dragon ver 1.0.0.!!).
It started when I asked myself “Why I need to spend days for one Level?”, “Why I need to walk between a city and dungeon for resupply?”, “Why I need to roaming around the RPG world for catch all side quest?”, “Why I always see ultimate potion and skill spamming for an eternity in every fight moment?” and “Why would I build a city and farm in the RPG game?”.

5 Questions and this game in your hands is born. And for asking my question, I changed the rules in my RPG game by

1.Remove Leveling system always from my RPG game and use the certification system: The Certification system is giving a point to up skill similarly to the leveling system. But you only get [Certificate points] by just progress a quests or unlock conditions. So you don’t need to spend a lot of time on many quests for just one level.


2.Remove Roaming side quest always from my RPG game and use the Documentation system: The Documentation system works similarly to the Achievement unlock system. But in addition, you also get text stories to read about this world and give you rewards such as [Certificate points] After unlocking. So, you can complete the challenge anywhere and anytime.


3.Remove Fighting inventory always from my RPG game and use the 6 of skill General slots system: So you can’t spam potions and skills. Because all 6 slots are the quota for setting skills and food in single battle. So, you will need to resupply. Recheck your gear or change your skill settings for each battle.


4.Remove City Tycoon always from my RPG game and use the Construction system: Why you need to set an area for building something in the RPG game? Why do you have to decide where to place your house?. In this game, NPCs will build their own town by themselves and provide [Benefits] to your characters. Additionally, if you want to build that gives you the [Benefits] you want, you can cooperate with NPCs to build by [Donating] them.


5.Adding Split and join party system: Why don’t you leave someone behide in the city and send a supply into your inventory? You can divide the team into two or three groups to do different activities. Or characters join together to fight monsters.


5 Concepts, 4 Removes and 1 added features. GeminiFlame : Alpha Dragon has begun.
If you're interested, I suggest you read my [GeminiFlame Alpha Dragon 1.0.0. Manual(1st edition)] before purchasing.(this game is too complicate it, no joke!!)

content_descriptors.notes: This game tells you about the conflict between many people in GeminiFlame World. Some are greedy, some are jealous, some have their own interests. Some people hide their goals. But this game doesn't show you that directly. “You have to listen to them word by word. "Not the character's tone of voice" "Don't judge them personally" "Read as many documents as possible" "Don't let your emotions cloud your reason" In GeminiFlame : Alpha Dragon 1.0.0, it will test your logic and your critical thinking. [This game is not a roguelike game. It doesn't have very violent content. But it is dark with its own story. I recommend that people aged 15 and up play this game.]

movies.name: GeminiFlame : Alpha Dragon | Release Date Trailer | PC

name: GeminiFlame : Alpha Dragon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-4030U CPU @ 1.90GHz 1.90 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-11400H @ 2.70GHz 2.69 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: You are the one!! Who came to this RPG world during a time of conflict among the local people. You have 4 character to take care and fight with the dragon and more?. What is happen? And What's wrong with them? Adventure to this world and discover it for yourself!!
